titles.title: A bill to amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 and the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 to describe the scope of activities subject to a presumption of the applicability of an exclusion under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.

A bill to amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 and the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 to describe the scope of activities subject to a presumption of the applicability of an exclusion under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill revises the environmental review of projects on federal lands to expedite geothermal exploration or development activities.
